mapper.insert: insert into editorReview_tb (editorReview_reviewId, editorReview_editorId, editorReview_memberId, editorReview_body, editorReview_score, editorReview writtenDate) values (#{reviewId}, #{editorId}, #{memberId}, #{body}, #{score}, #{writtenDate})
mapper.select: select editorReview_reviewId reviewId, editorReview_editorId editorId, editorReview_memberId memberId, editorReview_body body, editorReview_score score, editorReview writtenDate writtenDate from editorReview_tb
